forward_facing: toward the creatures pulling the vehicle or the front of the sleigh in the case of air current propulsion
acceleration: half the speed of the pulling creature(s) (muscle), or 30 ft. (current)
propulsion: muscle (pulled; 4 Medium creatures or 1 Large creature; on ice, the creatures must be clawed rather than hoofed) or current (air; 8-square sail; hp 40)
driving_space: the two most forward squares of the sleigh
driving_device: reins (muscle propulsion) or rigging (air current propulsion)
maximum_speed: twice the speed of the pulling creature(s) (muscle), or 100 ft. (current)
squares: 4 (10 ft. by 10 ft.; 3 feet high or 13 feet high with sail)
name: Sleigh
driving_check: Handle Animal or Profession (driver) (in the case of creatures with animal intelligence), Diplomacy or Intimidate (in the case of intelligent creatures pulling the vehicle), or Acrobatics (in the case of air current; +10 to the DC)
